code: import{SEARCH_MOVIE,FETCH_MOVIES,FETCH_MOVIE,LOADING,POPULAR_MOVIES}from'./types';import axios from'axios';export var searchMovie=function searchMovie(text){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:SEARCH_MOVIE,payload:text});};};export var setPopularMovies=function setPopularMovies(result){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:POPULAR_MOVIES,payload:result});};};export var fetchMovies=function fetchMovies(text){return function(dispatch){axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=c6441a90d447e1197b8eeb6295d9992a&query=".concat(text)).then(function(response){return dispatch({type:FETCH_MOVIES,payload:response.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var fetchMovie=function fetchMovie(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/".concat(id,"?api_key=c6441a90d447e1197b8eeb6295d9992a")).then(function(response){return dispatch({type:FETCH_MOVIE,payload:response.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(){return{type:LOADING};};
